all the system alerts(notifications) will be sent

messages regarding his listings will be sent

This e-mail is already in use
Max number of photos per 1 listing, subsection "Photo"
Max number of photos per 1 listing, subsection "Planning"
Use approve of the uploaded video files (when turned off, all files waiting for approval get approved automatically)
Use approve of the uploaded photos (when turned off, all files waiting for approval get approved automatically)
There are no icons. You can add icons using the form below
Available language versions of the site
Add language version of the site
Design theme of the admin mode
Number of rows in different tables of the administrator's section
Number of news per page in the user mode
Users in the user mode (on Black List page, on Hot List page, etc.)
Listings in the usermode (in the user's listings list, in search from)
Number of listings per page in the administrator's section
Use selected country by default in all search forms
Change the list of countries in the search form
Countries are not installed! It's necessary to install at least one country to use the site.

Here you can change administrator' info: password, e-mail for system messages, your personal data. Interface language is s site interface language after authorization, all system messages sent to your email address are in this language too.

Please indicate the countries that will be used on the site.
If you want one of the countries to be set by default for all search forms of the site, please choose it from the list and check "Use selected country by default in all search forms".
Using the option "Change the list of countries in the search form" you will be able to add or remove countries.

Here you can set accessibility of the language versions of the site to your site visitors and create new language site version, for example, German, French, Spanish. Your site visitors will be able to choose the language from the list of available ones.
When a new language is added to the site, all the language files are copied from the English language files, so once you add a new language you should go to the section "Menu and content settings" to translate the files of the newly added language.
Here you can work on the informational content of the user and admin modes (language versions management).
Miscellaneous settings of the site management
Size of the image in the listing shown in the search results. A reduced copy of the first loaded photo.
Parameters for photos demontsration in the listing, subsections "Photo" and "Planning".
Parameters for video demontsration in the listing, subsection "Video".
Parameters for slideshow photos of those who used paid service "Make the listing featured in the search".

Members usually post their listings without photos. This reduces the attraction of your site and meber's listing. To improve the situation the system inserts the icon into the listing automatically corresponding to the member's type.
You can change the icons to your own.

Choose the mode for site operation.

Site can function in 3 modes:
  1. A webmaster providing FSBO/Flat Fee listings website services
  2. A separate realtor or real estate company site
  3. Your custom mode
Fully functional version is a mode A webmaster providing FSBO/Flat Fee listings website services.

In mode A separate realtor or real estate company site some sections and links are disabled and not displayed.
Mode peculiarities:
  1. Registration for your site visitors is not available. They will not have to register to browse the site
  2. Administrator can add a realtor in the admin mode of the site. The added realtor will be able to login via admin mode of the site and will be transferred to the part for registered members. Here he will be able to add the listings.
  3. Only property for sale and property for rent is available on the site.
  4. Search form includes a search for property for sale and for rent only.
  5. Paid services are not included.
  6. The following options are not available: Hot List, Black List, Show interest in the lsiting.
  7. While viewing a listing, a user can send a message to listing owner's private Email (Email will be hidden and not displayed in the forms). Section "My Messages" is not available as its usage requires registration which is not available in this mode.
It is not possible to modify the settings of first 2 modes, but you can setup and manage site settings in Your custom mode in accord with your service requirements. If you disable paid services, check if members of 'Free group' have access to all sections.
If you disable certain types of operation (to buy, to sell, to rent or to lease), a user will be offered to save disabled type under a different (enabled) type of operation.

When you change the mode of your site operation, all the information is getting saved and restored quickly.

In order to add a listing in the mode "A separate realtor or real estate agent/broker" or "Your custom mode", if you disabled registration, add a user - Real Estate company or Agent or Real Estate company in the admin mode.
Menu names in the user mode
Field "Age" in the user mode. Date
A webmaster providing FSBO/Flat Fee listings website services
A separate realtor or real estate agent/broker
Contact info of the listing owner will be shown to registered users from a free group
Contact info of the listing owner will be shown to unregistered users
Show map in listing view section
Show map in search results (only for Google Maps)
Choose maps that will be used on your site. Enter the key for using maps service and save changes.

To add a new language, enter language name into a corresponding field using latin symbols; choose base language which files will be used as a basis for translating into a newly added language.

for example, you want to add French language and transfer into French you prefer from English.
Enter 'french' in the field for the language name. As a base language choose English.
Once you click Save button, the following will happen:

  • in the folder /lang a new folder will be created - /french, all English language files will be copied there (/lang/english);
  • in files /menu/lang_menu.xml, /menu/admin_lang_menu.xml a line 'french' will be added.
Once you add a language you will need to:
  • translate the line 'french' for each language in files /menu/lang_menu.xml, /menu/admin_lang_menu.xml (corresponding to the files in menu "menu names in the user mode" while choosing a section for language version editing);
  • translate all the files of french language.
Are you sure you want to remove the language version
Limit of listings per private persons

You can set a limitation for a number of listings added by private persons. For example, John Smith, a private person, will not be able to post more than 3 listings. He will get a message with a suggestion to change his status "Private persion" into "Real Estate company" or "Agent of Real Estate company". Once status is change, the limitation becomes inactive.
Such limitation is useful for getting better statistics on the number of realtors and private persons amonth your service users.
Limit of listings for private persons

In this area you can edit the messages that will be shown to users if there are any server errors listed in the table. You can translate the message into all interface languages of the site clicking the links with the the languages in the line "Interface language".
In the column "Message for a user" you can edit the message that will be shown to a user if there is a server error. If you decide to return the message, displayed be default, click "Set" in the column "Message by default". To save modified messages, click the button "Save".
To preview the message display, click "View" and the page with the message will be opened in a new window.

Optimize your site for search engines - add values for the main site metatags (Title, Keywords and Description) for each page. You can translate metatags into a;; site languages clicking the links with language names in the line "Interface language".
To view tha page metatags for which you edit, click "View" and the page will be opened in a new window.
Clcik the button "Save" to save the changes applied.
Here you can turn on watermark to be included in the loaded images and manage its settings.

In this section you can change default images for logotypes and slogans with your own. While saving your loaded images, the system will automatically adoptate them to fit standard sizes.
For each language version it is possible to create unique logotype settings clicking the links with language name in the line "Interface language".
Logotype (on the main page of the registered member)
Slogan (on the main page of the registered member)

Use this switch to be able to set listings statuses "Sold" and "Leased". Such listings will also be active during search and will be displayed in its results. Their status will be marked with a special icon next to the listing. While disabling this status, all listings with status "Sold" or "Leased" become inactive and don't take part in search.
Headline is displayed in the listing description in search results. A definite number if symbols is displayed, you can set it below.
Number of symbols displayed in headline
Period of listings activity in days

Set the period for listings activity from the date it becomes active. Once this period expires, the listing will automatically become inactive and will not be displayed in search results. To make it active again, the user will need to mark the following "Make available for search for <number you set> days". This limitation does not influence the listings with the status "Sold". They are deactivated manually.
Set the max size of the loaded files and max length. The bigger size of the file - the better its quality. All video files loaded are converted info .FLV format.
Max number of videos per 1 listing, subsection "Video"
Square measure used on the site
Use map while editing user's profile
I want to receive a notification when

You should choose a company whose agent you would like to become. The company will receive your request for approval. If you are currently an agent of some company or you send your request for that, then you can remove this company or cancel your request.In this case you will become an independant agent, any compoany will be able to send you their offers to become their agent.In case you are not an agent for any company and you did not send request to become someone's agent, you can leave this field empty. This will make you independant agent. You can also change the company. In this case the company you were agent for will receive a notification informing that you are not their agent anymore..
To search enter identifying member's data: name, surname, company name.
There are no results matching your criteria
The company has not approved your request yet.
In orderr to change your type, you should remove yourself from the list of company's agents
In order to change your type, you should clean your agents list
Before deactivation, you should clean your agents list
Before deactivating your account you should remove ourself from the list of agents
The photo wasn't approved by administrator yet
The photo was blocked by administrator

Language interface search form. It allows you to find the necessary word or word combination from site language interface. The option may be useful to change some word(s) or word combination(s) in all language files.
Please, choose the language version and specify search string!
Position of currency symbol in price

If you enable user type 'Agent of Company', then correlation between Agent and Company will be enabled on the site. Members with user type 'Agent' will be able to apply a request to become some Company's agent. Company in its turn will be able to invite Agents to become the agent of their company.
Pay attention to the fact that when you disable such active user type as Agent of Company - all your site members will appear in status 'Private User' automatically.

Use 'Agent of company' user type
(this enables Agent-Company correlation)
Option 'Use 'Agent of company' user type' is disabled.
Error: please enter value more then '0'!
